pr_title: move PollerFactory to polling package; remove AzureHost

timeline.message: move PollerFactory to polling package; remove AzureHost

timeline.bodyText: Change according to java sdk guideline.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText:
The remaining public method (used by polling.PollerFactory) in the class is for pollingOperation, cancelOperation and fetchResultOperation, hence changing the class name to PollOperation.
Let me know if any suggestion.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
